text: Weingarten (, German for "wine garden"; Low Alemannic: Wãẽgaade) is a town in Baden-Württemberg. In 2020, has a population of 25,000 people. The town was called Altdorf before. It was renamed Weingarten in 1865. The name comes from the Weingarten Abbey. ==References== ==Other websites== * *University of Applied Sciences of Ravensburg-Weingarten *Teachers' College of Weingarten *Plätzlerzunft Altdorf-Weingarten 1348 e.V. *Specification and images of the Gabler organ from Die Orgelseite Category:Ravensburg (district) Category:Württemberg
title: Weingarten, Württemberg
